column6: Agent 108 is female and has two eligible male partners (IDs 111 and 23) within vision range who are fertile and have empty neighboring sites. Agent 108 also has empty neighboring sites and sufficient sugar (27.5) above the minimum required (6.5) for reproduction. Both partners have empty nearby positions for offspring placement. Since the agent can reproduce with up to 3 partners and both partners meet all criteria, reproduction with both partners is chosen to maximize reproductive success.

reasoning: Agent 2 is male, age 38, with sufficient sugar (65.0) above the minimum required for reproduction (6.0). There is one eligible partner, agent 112, who is female, age 18, within vision range, fertile, and has an empty neighboring site. Both agent 2 and agent 112 have empty adjacent sites, fulfilling the reproduction conditions. Since max_partners is 4 and only one eligible partner is available, agent 2 will reproduce with agent 112.
